alert.note: Alert for Palo Pinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 9:32PM CDT until May 11 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL PALO PINTO COUNTY... At 930 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 3 miles southeast of Palo Pinto, or 11 miles southwest of Mineral Wells, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. The potentially tornadic circulation will cross the Brazos River near Pleasant Valley. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
